entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 12:54 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
